name: Warpieces
description:
What is Warpieces?

Warpieces is an easy to pick up 1v1 turn-based strategy game where players assemble a band of eight units, including a hero unit, before the match starts and then race to defeat their opponent using a limited set of abilities that can be upgraded for each unit by picking up scrap around the level. Each battle takes roughly 10-20 minutes.

Who is Warpieces for?

Warpieces is intended to be a relaxing entry point for players who are interested in strategy games but are put off by steep learning curves and hour long commitments to each session.

A brief tutorial

*All units starts off the level. On their first turn they can be placed within their starting area. 

*Following that a unit may move and then use a skill, using a skill ends the units turn unless otherwise specified.

*Most skills deal damage, reducing a units health to 0 kills it and removes it from play.

*Controlling the crystals at the center of the map deals damage to the opposing hero unit at the end of all units turns.

*The winner is whoever can kill the opposing players hero units first.

*The entire game can be played with just a mouse.

How was Warpieces made?

Warpieces has been a work in progress for little under a year under the care of Swedish game dev students in Skövde on top of studies and other works.
